code: import{PickIssuesMessageComposer}from'@nitrots/nitro-renderer';import{SendMessageComposer}from'../../../../api';import{Base,Button,Column,Grid}from'../../../../common';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export const ModToolsOpenIssuesTabView=props=>{const{openIssues=null}=props;const onPickIssue=issueId=>SendMessageComposer(new PickIssuesMessageComposer([issueId],false,0,'pick issue button'));return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Column,{gap:0,overflow:"hidden",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Column,{gap:2,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Grid,{gap:1,className:"text-black fw-bold border-bottom pb-1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Base,{className:"g-col-2",children:"Type"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Base,{className:"g-col-3",children:"Room/Player"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Base,{className:"g-col-4",children:"Opened"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Base,{className:"g-col-3"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Column,{overflow:"auto",className:"striped-children",gap:0,children:openIssues&&openIssues.length>0&&openIssues.map(issue=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Grid,{gap:1,alignItems:"center",className:"text-black py-1 border-bottom",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Base,{className:"g-col-2",children:issue.categoryId}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Base,{className:"g-col-3",children:issue.reportedUserName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Base,{className:"g-col-4",children:new Date(Date.now()-issue.issueAgeInMilliseconds).toLocaleTimeString()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Base,{className:"g-col-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"success",onClick:event=>onPickIssue(issue.issueId),children:"Pick Issue"})})]},issue.issueId);})})]});};
